name: Tasty Cake Shop
description:
Play amazing tasty cake shop game. Make your perfect cake and crete decoration. There are so many beautiful varity and collection.

==========
Top Features:
==========
- It's amazing beautiful graphics interface.
- Choose from a variety of ingredients.
- Serve customers with cakes they want.
- Sell as many cakes as you can to enlarge the business
- Supported IOS11.

Have fun to cook yummy cakes. So are you ready for play this game?

Download Now...
